argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dmfco | |- ( ( Fun G /\ A e. dom G ) -> ( A e. dom ( F o. G ) <-> ( G ` A ) e. dom F ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_funres | |- ( Fun G -> Fun ( G |` { A } ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( A e. dom G /\ Fun G ) -> ( A e. dom G /\ Fun ( G |` { A } ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( Fun G /\ A e. dom G ) -> ( A e. dom G /\ Fun ( G |` { A } ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-dfat | |- ( G defAt A <-> ( A e. dom G /\ Fun ( G |` { A } ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_afvfundmfveq | |- ( G defAt A -> ( G ''' A ) = ( G ` A ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylbir | |- ( ( A e. dom G /\ Fun ( G |` { A } ) ) -> ( G ''' A ) = ( G ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( Fun G /\ A e. dom G ) -> ( G ''' A ) = ( G ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( Fun G /\ A e. dom G ) -> ( G ` A ) = ( G ''' A ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( Fun G /\ A e. dom G ) -> ( ( G ` A ) e. dom F <-> ( G ''' A ) e. dom F ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( Fun G /\ A e. dom G ) -> ( A e. dom ( F o. G ) <-> ( G ''' A ) e. dom F ) ) |
